name: Shift Kit | Vision & Mission
description: One of the most important thing that you can do to align a team, is to have clarity in purpose. What are we doing, why are we doing it, how will we do it, and how will we measure success? Often everyone has a slightly different version of this in their heads, and nowhere is it written down, succinctly, for everyone to refer to. One of the other benefits of this is that helps drive better decision making.
